channel.title: Help
channel.description: is there a client that is has nothing on it? maybe some shops and stuff i want to make a server but i dont like the soem over the thing people have made so i just want to try to make one

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @hamster_phat hamster phat
item.description:
@hamster_phat wrote:

if your good at coding, id recommend gangscape, it may be old, but its very good to learn on. if your new, i recommend phonescape or pimpscape. those are easy as hell to learn the basics of coding from. like making a second copy of it to test your coding out so you dont mess up your server, so its always good to have a spare when coding

Hamster Phat

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Clients dont (normally) have the shops coded in. They’re normally free to edit. Do you mean a source? If it’s your first server, TestScape or Cheezscape are good to begin with. Google them.

:)[br][size=1]Posted on: September 10, 2007, 03:35:32 PM[/size][hr]Ricscape is a good starter, but if you need help half-way through, it’s not as easy to find a good guide for them.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Manofwar93 Manofwar93
item.description:
@Manofwar93 wrote:

If your looking for a starter source ‘Ricscape V3’ is a good starter. If your not looking for that then I can’t help any further

Read full topic
